properties.title: Cozy Beachfront Cottage
properties.description: Enjoy breathtaking ocean views from this charming beachfront cottage. Perfect for a relaxing getaway with family or friends.

properties.title: Luxury City Apartment
properties.description: Modern and spacious apartment located in the heart of Nairobi with top-notch amenities and city skyline views.

properties.title: Safari Lodge
properties.description: Immerse yourself in nature at this beautiful safari lodge near Maasai Mara. Includes guided tours and local cuisine.

properties.title: Mountain Cabin Retreat
properties.description: A peaceful cabin in the mountains surrounded by scenic views. Ideal for couples or solo travelers seeking tranquility.

reviews.name: Alice Wambui
reviews.comment: The view was absolutely stunning and the cottage was clean and cozy. Would definitely visit again!

reviews.name: James Kariuki
reviews.comment: Lovely stay, great location, but Wi-Fi was a bit slow at times.

reviews.name: Sarah Mwangi
reviews.comment: The apartment was luxurious and well-equipped. Everything was spotless.

reviews.name: Peter Otieno
reviews.comment: An unforgettable experience! The staff were kind and the safaris were well-organized.
